io.micronaut.security.endpoints

Class LogoutController

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.security.endpoints.LogoutController

  • @Requires(property="micronaut.security.endpoints.logout.enabled",notEquals="false",defaultValue="true") @Requires(beans=LogoutHandler.class)
 @Controller(value="${micronaut.security.endpoints.logout.path:/logout}")
 @Secured(value="isAnonymous()")
public class LogoutController
extends java.lang.Object
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergio del Amo
